title: All 32 - Minnesota Vikings: Dalvin Cook holdout is doubtful plus a defensive downgrade? with Arif Hasan (Football 6/11)
description:
'All 32' rolls along and on this episode we're talking Vikings with Arif Hasan of The Athletic. Dalvin Cook has been in the news recently, and Arif tells host Will Brinson the possibility of a holdout from the star running back (1:00). The guys also discuss what the offense could look like this year after the departure of Stefon Diggs (5:15). The defense dealt with a ton of departures themselves (12:15). Will Mike Zimmer be able to overcome those losses? Check out our Vikings chat!
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ArifHasanNFL

itunes:subtitle: Should the Vikings be fearful of a Dalvin Cook holdout? How would the offense look with and without him? Arif Hasan of The Athletic answers that and more.
